name: react-advanced-loader
description: React higher-order component that prevents a wrapped component from rendering until specified conditions are met, i.e., an API response is received or some prop is updated. Displays selected animated spinner from react-spinkit collection while loading.

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack index.js dist/react-advanced-loader.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack index.js dist/react-advanced-loader.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: George Borunov <george@borunov.com> (http://borunov.com)
